title: Can I remove the battery? Will configuring my phone to automatically set the date and time generate data traffic?
answer:
The battery is removable. Whether the date and time will changed to the original one is not related.

if you have enabled the automatic time update function, your phone synchronizes the date and time with the network, which will generate minor data traffic.

If your phone fails to obtain the date and time from your service provider's network when it powers on and if you have enabled the automatic time update function, your phone synchronizes the date and time with the network, which will generate minor data traffic.
